title: GQSP (Generalized Quantum Signal Processing)
subtitle: Preparing a simple state, cos^3(x), with Generalized Quantum Signal Processing (GQSP)
description: Implementation of generalized quantum signal processing (gqsp) is a quantum algorithmic primitive that extends standard qsp, allowing one to block-encode arbitrary polynomials of unitary operations [\[1\]](#ref-gqsp). it removes the “realness” and parity restrictions on achievable polynomials that appear in qsp [\[2\]](#ref-grand) and provides a simple recipe for constructing complex polynomials with on the unit circle. moreover, it can be used to implement polynomials with negative powers, i.e.
